=== building by-hand on the command-line ===

1. compile the abc files
{{{
 $ cd redtamarin-trunk/src/core
 $ ./builtin.py
}}}

{{{
 $ cd redtamarin-trunk/src/shell
 $ ./shell_toplevel.py
}}}

2. compile
{{{
 $ cd redtamarin-trunk
 $ cd src
 $ mkdir objdir-release
 $ cd objdir-release
 $ python ../configure.py --enable-shell
 $ make
 ...
}}}
